mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily.stories (article_id, title, source_name, source_icon, link, summary, thumbnail, thumbnail_small, published_date, created_at) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{title}, #{sourceName}, #{sourceIcon}, #{link}, #{summary}, #{thumbnail}, #{thumbnailSmall}, #{publishedDate}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daily.stories WHERE link = #{link}
